chat.welcome: Welcome to nowty, I'm using OpenAI Completion API with your API key, this will incur costs if you have linked a payment method. For more information, click on the following links: Completion API Pricing How to get an API key
chat.welcome_turbo: Welcome to nowty, I'm using OpenAI Chat Completion API with your API key, this will incur costs if you have linked a payment method. For more information, click on the following links: Chat Completion API Pricing How to get an API key In addition, the Chat Completion API uses the gpt-3.5-turbo model, which includes response moderation. If you want to give me some context, click on the second button to send me the first message.
chat.question: Question

errors.COMMON_ERROR: An error has occurred, please try again later

OPENAI.NO_API_KEY: You have not entered any API key
OPENAI.API_KEY_ERROR: The API key provided is invalid

CHAT.CANNOT_CREATE_NEW_EMPTY_CHAT_EXISTING_ON: You cannot have more than one new chat
